name: SPINBOT ARENA
description:
Details

SPINBOT ARENA is an arena fighting game up to 4 players where you control a tiny robot able to charge and spin to knock out their opponents. Be quick and work on your parry timings to shove the other Spinbots in the goals to get as many points as you can before the timer runs out!

Controls

A controller is preferred for a better experience.

Left Stick / ZQSD : Move

Left Trigger / Right click : Charge (release to spin)

Right Trigger / Shift : Brake (in spin mode)

Left Face Button / E : Counter (Counter an opponent when they in spin mode!)

Down Face Button / Enter : Confirm (Menu)

The Team

Game Designers : Grégoire Vottero - Romain de Leuze - Julien Barlet - Gaëtan Perré-Moutier

Game Artists : Judicaël da Silva Opter - Hugo Dobrenel - Gabriel Kenig

Game Programmers : Tom Moryas - Romain Malka - Thomas Kang - Antoine Esbelin

Sound Designers : Théo Clavel - Jean-Guillaume Goujon

Speaker : Antoine Bouvier-Chenard
